tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tax_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  taxpayer_name VARCHAR(255),
  tax_year INT,
  taxable_income DECIMAL(10, 2),
  tax_liability DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE tax_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  taxpayer_id INT,
  tax_year INT,
  income DECIMAL,
  deduction DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE tax_calculations (
  calculation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  tax_due DECIMAL,
  tax_paid DECIMAL,
  tax_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE tax_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  taxpayer_name VARCHAR(100),
  tax_year INT,
  total_income DECIMAL(10, 2),
  tax_liability DECIMAL(10, 2),
  payment_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE tax_calculations (
  calculation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  taxable_income DECIMAL(10, 2),
  deductions DECIMAL(8, 2),
  tax_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
  tax_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE tax_payments (
  payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  payment_date DATE,
  payment_method VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE TaxRecords (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  taxpayer_id INT NOT NULL,
  tax_year INT NOT NULL,
  income DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  tax_due DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tax_records (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tax_year INT,
  income DECIMAL,
  deductions DECIMAL,
  taxable_income DECIMAL,
  tax_due DECIMAL,
  payment_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE tax_payers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone VARCHAR(20),
  registration_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE tax_rates (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tax_year INT,
  tax_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE tax_payments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  payer_id INT,
  payment_date TIMESTAMP,
  amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE deductions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  deduction_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  amount DECIMAL
)
